hero.tagline: Each project reflects our ability to deliver the latest and innovative technological solutions for our clients. We always strive to deliver the best results and meet our customers' expectations.

website.name: Bunda Bakery
website.title: Bakery Shop Website
website.description: Bunda Bakery is a bakery website for "Bunda Bakery" which provides information about bakeries and online shops that are integrated with WhatsApp.
website.problem: Limited information on bakeries and their products and traditional ordering processes.
website.solution: Creation of a bakery and bakery company profile website that displays all products and orders integrated with WhatsApp.

highlights.title: Online Shop
highlights.description: Displays all bread variants sold at Bunda Bakery so that customers are aware of all available products.

highlights.title: Website integration with WhatsApp
highlights.description: All orders on the website will be integrated with a WhatsApp CTA directed to the Bunda Bakery contact.

testimonial.content: "Our online store's design is simple and structured, making it easy for customers to find products effortlessly. An intuitive purchasing process and clear store information significantly enhance the shopping experience."
testimonial.name: M. Dedi Iswantoro

website.name: Mountler
website.title: Travel
website.description: Mountler is a website to help climbers make climbing reservations online.
website.problem: The climbing booking system includes registration, payment, and the traditional climbing process which takes time and is less efficient.
website.solution: Creation of a climbing booking website that serves from user registration, automatic payment, to a digital ticket system.

highlights.title: Wherever, Whenever
highlights.description: Book mountain climbing in Indonesia via our website anywhere and anytime.

highlights.title: Climbing Tracking
highlights.description: Track your climbing timeline from start to descent.

highlights.title: Fast and easy payments
highlights.description: Climbing payments are automatic and integrated with a safe and reliable system.

testimonial.content: "I am very satisfied with the mountler website! The design is consistent and the color blending is very good. The features run smoothly, and I am confident that its implementation will be perfect and capable of handling data well and preventing errors when accessed by many people."
testimonial.name: Megawati Aswiya Putri

website.name: Luxspace
website.title: Furniture Marketplace
website.description: Involuntir is a social enterprise that invites young people to become volunteers and participate in humanitarian social activities.
website.problem: Competition is high in the household furniture marketplace.
website.solution: Creation of a website that focuses on the furniture buying and selling process by displaying product details and an integrated payment system.

website.name: Involuntir
website.title: Pendaftaran Volunteer Berbayar
website.description: Involuntir is a social enterprise that invites young people to become volunteers and participate in humanitarian social activities.
website.problem: There is no volunteer registration system that is integrated into one service.
website.solution: Creation of a volunteer registration website that provides information and registration payments in an integrated manner with the organization organizing the activity.

highlights.title: Wherever, Whenever
highlights.description: Register and become a volunteer via the website which can be accessed anywhere and anytime.

highlights.title: Fast and easy payments
highlights.description: Payment for volunteer registration is automatic and integrated with a safe and reliable system.

website.name: Laracamp
website.title: Bootcamp Website
website.description: Laracamp is a website that provides online bootcamps for anyone who wants to develop their skills in the field of software development.
website.problem: Bootcamps still use traditional systems from registration to training that are not yet digitally systemized.
website.solution: Creation of a website that provides bootcamp services with an overall digital system.

highlights.title: Wherever, Whenever:
highlights.description: Follow the bootcamp you want simply via the website which can be accessed anywhere and anytime.

highlights.title: Google Authentication
highlights.description: Simply log in to our website with the Google account you have.

android.name: Shamo
android.title: Shoes Store App
android.description: Shamo is an e-commerce application for an online shoe shop that provides a variety of shoes by ordering via the application.
android.problem: Obstacles in conventional buying and selling of shoes that do not provide a guarantee of the originality of the shoes to be purchased.
android.solution: Creating an e-commerce application for an integrated online shoe store that can bring together customers and sellers in one application.

highlights.title: Integrated service
highlights.description: Check and buy various shoe choices in one application.
